text: manuṣyaril satyaviśvāsikaḷēāṭ ēṟṟavuṁ kūṭutal śatrutayuḷḷavar yahūdaruṁ bahudaivārādhakarumāṇenn niścayamāyuṁ ninakk kāṇāṁ; ñaṅṅaḷ kristyānikaḷāṇ ennu paṟaññavarāṇ viśvāsikaḷēāṭ kūṭutal snēhamuḷḷavarennuṁ. avaril paṇḍitanmāruṁ lēākaparityāgikaḷāya purēāhitanmārumuṇṭennatuṁ avar ahanta naṭikkunnillennatumāṇitinu kāraṇaṁ
